config.section.BasicConfig.name: Basic Configuration
config.DefaultFrame.name: Default Frame
config.DefaultFrame.description: Select default portrait frame to display. This will turn this mod into a portrait frame replacement.
config.DisableConditional.name: Disable Conditional
config.DisableConditional.description: Display selected 'Default Frame' without any other variation.
config.HideHeartIndicator.name: Hide Heart Indicator
config.HideHeartIndicator.description: This will hide heart level indicator that located on bottom right side of character portrait. Heart level will still appear when hovered over.
Coalclaw_ShopDescription: Well cared adults will gather coal clumps!
Honeypuff_ShopDescription: The puff produces its own honey
Molecat_ShopDescription: Digs up mining nodes when roam freely
Petalkin_ShopDescription: Grows in-season forages on its back
Timberbark_ShopDescription: Drops woods and place them in neat piles
Jellomone_Description: Living rock that have the ability to produce jellies from many habitats.
CoalclawEgg_Description: Aside of the shell color it's not that different from a chicken egg.
Puff_Description: Puff is here to give name to a honey.
LargeCoalclawClump_Description: Large pieace of coals brittly binded together.
TimberbarkPile_Description: Pile of woods and other natural resources.
LargeTimberbarkPile_Description: Large pile of woods and other natural resources.
SpringForagePatch_Description: Has many of the valley's spring forages.
SummerForagePatch_Description: Has many of the valley's summer forages.
FallForagePatch_Description: Has many of the valley's fall forages.
WinterForagePatch_Description: Has many of the valley's winter forages.
GingerIslandForagePatch_Description: Has many of Ginger Island's winter forages.
